title.rendered: St John Off Road 4WD First Aid Kit

content.rendered:
• Qty Item
    1 Crepe bandage – 10cm x 1.5m
    2 Conforming bandage – 5cm x 1.5m
    2 Conforming bandage – 7.5cm x 1.5m
    4 Triangular Bandage 110cm x 110cm
    2 Combine dressing pad – 10 x 20cm
    2 Non-adherent dressing – 7.5 x 10cm
    2 Non-adherent dressing – 7.5 x 20cm
    2 Sterile wound dressing – No. 13
    2 Sterile wound dressing – No. 15
    2 Eye pad – sterile (large)
    5 Gauze swabs sterile – 7.5 x 7.5cm (pk 5)
    1 Hypo-allergenic tape – 2.5cm x 9.1m
    1 Fabric strips (pk 50)
    1 Antiseptic wipes (pk 10)
    3 Alcohol swabs (pk 10)
    3 Saline Steritube – 30ml
    1 Scissors s/s sharp/blunt – 12.5cm
    1 Forceps s/s sharp – 12.5cm
    5 Splinter probe/remover sterile disposable (pk 5)
    1 Safety Pins – assorted (pk 12)
    2 Gloves nitrile disposable – large (pk 2)
    1 Disposable goggles – clear
    1 Resuscitation mask – pocket
    1 Emergency shock blanket
    1 Instant cold pack – disposable
    1 Biohazard waste bag – yellow (large)
    6 Safety Pins – assorted (pk 12)
    1 DRABCD Action Plan – 110 x 125mm
    1 Work injury report triplicate x 10 reports
    1 Notepad & pencil in bag
    1 “Emergency First Aid

Specifications

  • Shipping Weight 2.3 kg
    Package Width 23 cm
    Package Height 19 cm
    Package Depth 39 cm

Details

  • Product Type Description Safety Kit
    Brand STJOHN
    Description C) OFF ROAD 4WD KIT

excerpt.rendered: This best selling kit is ideal for use when off the beaten track and medical help is some time away. Be prepared to treat minor scrapes through to major trauma and heavy bleeding.
